nml_option.name: config_AM_loadBalance_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member loadBalance is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_loadBalance_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_loadBalance_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the loadBalance analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_loadBalance_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_loadBalance_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_loadBalance_nProcs
nml_option.description: Number of processors to output results for

package.name: loadBalanceAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the loadBalance analysis member.

var.name: nCellsProcWithSeaIce
var.description: Number of cells with sea ice present per processor
